country.name: Vietnam
country.overview: Vietnam is a Southeast Asian country on the South China Sea known for its beaches, rivers, Buddhist pagodas and bustling cities. Hanoi, the capital, pays homage to the nation’s iconic Communist-era leader, Ho Chi Minh, via a huge marble mausoleum. Ho Chi Minh City (formerly Saigon) has French colonial landmarks, plus Vietnamese War history museums and the Củ Chi tunnels, used by Viet Cong soldiers.

translations.name: ປະເທດຫວຽດນາມ
ဗီယက်နမ်နိုင်ငံ
ประเทศเวียดนาม

geography.location_description: Southeastern Asia, bordering the Gulf of Thailand, Gulf of Tonkin, and South China Sea, as well as China, Laos, and Cambodia
geography.area_note: about three times the size of Tennesee; slightly larger than New Mexico
geography.climate: tropical in south; monsoonal in north with hot, rainy season (May to September) and warm, dry season (October to March)
geography.terrain: low, flat delta in south and north; central highlands; hilly, mountainous in far north and northwest
geography.hazards: occasional typhoons (May to January) with extensive flooding, especially in the Mekong River delta
geography.notes: extending 1,650 km north to south, the country is only 50 km across at its narrowest point

languages.name: Ho Chi Minh City Sign Language
